name: ECMAchine
description: A Lisp-based in-browser toy operating system

name: Problem Set? Marmoset!
description: Online LaTeX editor and motivational tool, inspired by Written? Kitten!

name: DiffNow
description: Online utility to compare files and share comparison reports, powered by ExamDiff Pro.

name: Not a Soul in the World
description: My entry into Ludum Dare #22. Help an emulated brain recover its memories.

name: Gromunity
description: A prototype of an online community for urban gardeners, built for the inaugural CleanWeb Hackathon.

name: pluralizer
description: A Yii widget to correctly pluralize dynamic data labels.

name: CitySandbox
description: A platform for participatory democracy, built for the Social Apps Lab at CITRIS.

name: JezzBall 3D
description: A 3D adaptation of the classic Windows game of JezzBall.

name: It's Not Easy Being Muammar
description: My entry into Ludum Dare #20. A satire of NATO intervention in the Libyan civil war.

name: Cal Day Photo Hunt
description: A competitive scavenger hunt run by the Social Apps Lab at CITRIS.

name: OOXML2Txt
description: An OpenXML (Office 2007+) to text conversion tool, made as a plugin for ExamDiff Pro.

name: Terra Nova
description: My entry into Ludum Dare #19. An exploration game about Robert Scott's Antarctic expedition.

name: RickRemoval
description: A browser extension to block rickroll videos, built for Yahoo Hack-U.

name: RootMusic BandPage
description: A Facebook app for dynamic pages for musicians that I helped work on during an internship.
